name: Dragonball Defend Earth
description:
ITA:

Aiuta Goku a salvare il pianeta dai nemici e salva la terra da Broly

Eng :

Help Goku save the planet from enemies and save the earth from Broly

Keyboard Controls:

 Arrow-Key

      Space

the game is in both Italian and English

ITA :

Il Download è disponibile per le piattaforme : Windows , linux e macos.Prossimamente sarà disponibile anche su Android

Eng :

The download is available for the platforms: Windows, Linux and Macos. It will also be available on Android soon

All rights reserved, please do not distribute this game without my permission.
